==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Gerunt Snezhevich is a servant of [[Arlecchino]] and helped save lives in the [[Spina di Rosula]]'s base at [[Poisson]]. Navia is grateful for Arlecchino and Gerunt's help. Gerunt is also a big fan of Charlotte's writing in [[The Steambird]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Finale}}</ref>

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
He has gray hair and dons the black and red uniform of a [[Fatui Pyro Agent]].
